definition: Zhao Benshan (1958-), universally known PRC TV comedian
surname Zhao/one of the seven states during the Warring States Period (476-220 BC)/the Former Zhao 前趙 (304-329) and Later Zhao 後趙 (319-350), states of the Sixteen Kingdoms
root/stem/origin/source/this/the current/original/inherent/originally/classifier for books, periodicals, files etc
mountain/hill/anything that resembles a mountain/CL:座[zuo4]/bundled straw in which silkworms spin cocoons/gable

sentences.english: Sketch actor Zhao Benshan is a household name in China.
sentences.chinese: 趙本山在中國家喻戶曉。

sentences.english: Zhao Benshan, China's best known comedian, remained in stable condition after undergoing an operation.
sentences.chinese: 中國最著名的笑星趙本山，手術之後身體狀態穩定。

sentences.english: I really love enjoy Zhao Benshan's newly farce "Liu Laogen".
sentences.chinese: 我真的很欣賞趙本山最新的滑稽戲“劉老根”。

sentences.english: The wet pet in the net hasn't got on the jet plane yet.
sentences.chinese: 網中趙本山開業管制溼寵物還沒有登上噴氣飛機。

sentences.english: Skit and sitcom actor Zhao Benshan is in the sixth place.
sentences.chinese: 小品演員趙本山位居第六。

sentences.english: And he and actor Zhao Benshan perform during the concert.
sentences.chinese: 期間，演員趙本山也助陣朗朗的演奏會，雅俗共賞。

sentences.english: Every year, Zhao is one major reason so many people stay tuned to the Gala.
sentences.chinese: 每年，趙本山都是人們鎖定春晚的一大原因。

definition: (of a man) to dress as a woman (idiom)
genre of song-and-dance duet popular in northeast China
precious darling (often refers to one's child)/sweetheart
Gong Li (1965-), PRC female film star
to show off/to put on a show to amuse others
a form of theatrical double act in which one performer speaks or sings while the other, in front, pretends to be doing the speaking or singing/double reed (as in an oboe or bassoon)
